Reviews.Title: “Positive experience”
Reviews.Author: Family_traveler94
Reviews.Content: My wife, daughter and I booked a triple room for 89 Euros/night (including breakfast buffet). It was well worth the price. The room was spacious, the beds comfortable, and the bathroom fully appointed. The hotel (also know as the Hotel Villa Konstanz) is 7 KM southwest of the Brandenburger Tor. The closest Metro station (Konstanzer. Str.) is only three blocks away, so access to all areas of Berlin is easy. The hotel is 3 KM NE of the Grunewald, a huge forest with excellent walking/jogging paths. There is plenty of space for off-street parking (no additional charge). The street in front of the hotel is noisy but the double pane, well insulated windows cut out virtually all exterior noise. The breakfast buffet is excellent with numerous options. The staff was friendly and helpful. In particular, they took care of reservations needed to visit the Reichstag (3-day advance booking is the norm).

Reviews.Title: “perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: 186402Andy
Reviews.Content: Lovely stay in this small but ideal, budget hotel. Near the underground, which runs out to the airport, and easy to get into the centre. Based in Wilmersdorf which is a nice area, well located for bars and restaurants. Privately run by some very nice, friendly people, excellent breakfast. We had a triple room which was large with en suite bathroom and shower. Very happy with all aspects of our stay and couldn't recommend it highly enough.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay at the Hotel Konstanz”
Reviews.Author: MarylandTraveler
Reviews.Content: This is a great find in Berlin - not too far from either Konstanzerstr. or Fehrbelliner Plazt U-Bahn stations or the Ku'Damm at Adenauer Platz. Our room was large and very comfortable. We were surpised that there were a lot of people staying at the pension it was so quiet. The choice at breakfast was amazing. We would highly recommend staying at the the Hotel Konstanz.

Reviews.Title: “Great pension in Berlin”
Reviews.Author: radio12
Reviews.Content: High ratio quality/price. Rooms are not really large and the bathroom was complete, the shower a little too little !!! Breakfast was OK and the people really friendly. Few minutes from bus ans subway. At the end we ( my wife and myself) strongly reccomend this hotel if you want to spend few money ( 60 euro/room by night) and enjoy the beautiful Berlin Laura e Marco da Saronno.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, quiet and spacious”
Reviews.Author: Latman96
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel. Friendly staff, non-smoking and quiet. We had a triple room which was very spacious. Excellent breakfast and free wifi. This is well recommended

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Pension Haus Konstanz”
Reviews.Author: TheHitman69
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned when I booked this hotel as I thought it may be a far from the town centre but as the U bahn is only a five minute walk away you can be anywhere in Berlin in 15 minutes, timetable premiting. Within ten minutes walk there are loads of restaurants and bars so I had no need to worry about the area being to quite in terms of nightlife. The man at reception was a bit Basil Fawlty but overall we had no real problems.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Chun1971
Reviews.Content: Stayed 1 night. Not far from center. Room is enormous, just like the bathroom. I wish my bathroom at home is that big! Breakfast is simple, but okay. Staff could be more friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay at Hotel Haus Konstanz”
Reviews.Author: DublinVinnieC
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights in April 2007. Excellent rate of €35 per night good breakfast, clean, quiet rooms with en suite. U and S bahn stations are only 5 minutes walk and from there about 15 minutes journey to the central tourist areas. The neighbourhood also has fairly decent facilities in terms of shops, bars and restaurants. One reception staff (male) was bit gruff (formal German) while the other (lady) was extrememly friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this Hotel for value, quality and location
